com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher
Class LinkDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.matcher.LinkDescriptor

public class LinkDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a hypothetical link between two DeployModelObjects. The link can be create()d.

See Also:
LinkType, LinkDescriptorFactory

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

LinkDescriptor

public LinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                      DeployModelObject source,
                      DeployModelObject target)
Constructor for LinkDescriptor. Identifies which units are the source and targets of the link. In this case, the link cannot be a dependency link.

Parameters:
type - type of the link; cannot be DEPENDENCY
source - the source object
target - the target object

LinkDescriptor

public LinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                      Unit source,
                      Requirement sourceRequirement,
                      Unit target,
                      Capability targetCapability)
Constructor for LinkDescriptor. Identifies which unit/requirement is the source and which unit/capability is the source.

Parameters:
type - the type of the link
source - the source unit
sourceRequirement - the source requirement; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
target - the target unit
targetCapability - the target capability; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links

LinkDescriptor

public LinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                      DeployModelObject source,
                      DeployModelObject target,
                      int linkWeight)
Constructor for LinkDescriptor. Identifies which units are the source and targets of the link. In this case, the link cannot be a dependency link.

Parameters:
type - type of the link; cannot be DEPENDENCY
source - the source object
target - the target object
linkWeight - assigned link weight

LinkDescriptor

public LinkDescriptor(LinkType type,
                      Unit source,
                      Requirement sourceRequirement,
                      Unit target,
                      Capability targetCapability,
                      int linkWeight)
Constructor for LinkDescriptor. Identifies which unit/requirement is the source and which unit/capability is the source.

Parameters:
type - the type of the link
source - the source unit
sourceRequirement - the source requirement; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
target - the target unit
targetCapability - the target capability; must be non-null for dependency links; may be null for logical link; must be null for hosting and unit collection links
linkWeight - assigned link weight
Method Detail

getSourceUnit

public Unit getSourceUnit()
Retrieve the source unit of a link or, if the source is a requirment, the unit containing the source requirment.

Returns:
the source unit

getTargetUnit

public Unit getTargetUnit()
Retrieve the target unit of a link or, if the target is a capability, the unit containing the target capability.

Returns:
the target unit

getSource

public DeployModelObject getSource()
Retrieve the source of a link. Will be:
  1. a requirement for dependency links,
  2. a unit for a member or hosting link,
  3. a unit, capability or requirement for a realization link, and
  5. anything for a logical link.

Returns:
the source object

getTarget

public DeployModelObject getTarget()
Retrieve the target of a link. Will be:
  1. a capability for dependency links,
  2. a unit for a member or hosting link,
  3. a unit, capability, or requirement for a realization link, and
  4. anything for a logical link.

Returns:
the target object

getType

public LinkType getType()
Retrieve the type of the link.

Returns:
the link type.

getLinkWeight

public int getLinkWeight()

getLinkDescriptorFactory

public AbstractLinkDescriptorFactory getLinkDescriptorFactory()
Get a factory to create link descriptors.

Returns:
the link descriptor factory

create

public DeployModelObject create()
Create the link described by this descriptor.

Returns:
the link (as a DeployModelObject).

internalCreate

public void internalCreate()
Create the link described by this descriptor.

Parameters:
source - source unit of the link
sourceRequirement - source requirement of the link
target - target unit of the link
targetCapability - target capability of the link
